title: Legacy skin splash art not showing up
body: when i click on certain champions that have legacy skins in the champ or through the profile section the legacy skins splash art do not pop up. but when im in champion select they do show up.

replies.body:
Hey DuraDark,

If you don't own a legacy skin, it won't show up in the Champion Details Page.
But that's the thing I do own kitty kat katarina and slay bell. It just is not appearing on the details page

Okay, gotcha. 

I just checked my account (I have Kitty Kat Katarina owned) and I'm able to see both that legacy skin and Slay Belle. Would you mind checking to see if this is still can issue for you? :]
ok it has fixed itself, thank you

It's a store loading error. It happens to me all the time when I've been logged in for a long time, and relogging fixes it. You can see that it can't tell what you own at all (can't even see that you own Kat).

Just logged in because I have the same issue, but I also noticed that it never get past the fact that I unlocked the champion.
Before, it used to display a gray button, that turned (after a short time) Orange and/or became a message that said that the champion is unlocked.

When said message was displayed, the legacy skins' splashes that I owned appeared along the other splashes.

But since the last patch, the gray button remains gray, nothing happens, even if I wait a long time.

Sorry for the brocken English. Hope that helps!
You can see the bug your talking about in the image on the post
